original: BILDE, Nils Tage Ragnvald, Civilingenjör, Direktör, Stockholm, f S Vram, Malmöh län, 26/7 86 av öv.mask N P B o Elise Lundvall, gm (2) Greta Lidell. Ex Chalmers 09. Kontr v Sanneg.hamn nybyggn i Gbg 09—10, bitr distr.ing i Sthlms hamnstyr 10—13, övering.-ass v Göta kanal 13—18, vkst dir f Gbgs hdlstidn 18—22, eg ing o aff.verksamh 22—24, tekn ch f Gbgs-Posten 24, dir f Sv eement-fören i Sthlm sed. 26, utg tidskr Cement o betong sed. 26, länsstyr omb i Fredsbergs tax.nmd 15—18, ordf i Fredsbergs livsm.nmd 0 Töreboda el.verk 16—18, v. ordf i Chalmers ing.fören 18—23, styr.led i Sv tidn.utg.fören arb.giv.sekt. 18—22, i Sthlms trafikkl sed. 30 (sekr 35—40), i Sv teknol.fören (väg- o vatten) sed. 40, sakk h 1937 års granitutr, led av bestyr f utst Cement o betong 1941, ordf i idr.-sällsk L S, Gbg, 18—24, init.tag o dirig f Gbgs sångargille 20—22, hed.dirig 22, dirig f Göta Par Bricoles sångk 20—25, 1. förb.dirig 1 Västergötl sångarförb 20—27, hed.led 35, ledare av sång.färder t Danm o Tyskl, musik-krit i Gbgs-Tidn 21—22, Gbgs Aftbl 23—24, intend f utst av Sv Konst i Gbg 23, dirig f Dansk Foren Ork 32—35, f Sv teknol.fören ork sed. 39. Resor: USA 30, Tyskl, Holl, Österr, Danm, Norge, Finl uppr ggr. Av trycket: Cement o betong, Tekn folkbibi, Cementkatekes, art o föredr i betongtekn o trafiktekn-ekon ämnen. Komp Festouvert f st ork, Skåningar, f solo o manskör. RVO, skyt.m g, arméns d :o s., Götiska förb, Gbg, Par Bricole. Hobbies: Sång, musik, målning, tennis.
translated: BILDE, Nils Tage Ragnvald, Civil Engineer, Director, Stockholm, b. S Vram, Malmö County, 26/7 86, son of military man N P B and Elise Lundvall, m. (2) Greta Lidell. Graduated from Chalmers in 1909. Contracted to build the Sanneg harbor in Gothenburg from 09-10, assistant district engineer at the Stockholm Port Authority from 10-13, assistant engineer at the Göta Canal from 13-18, development director for the Gothenburg Trade Newspaper from 18-22, owned engineering and business activities from 22-24, technical manager for the Gothenburg Post from 24, director for the Swedish Cement Association in Stockholm since 26, publisher of the journal Cement and Concrete since 26, member of the county board and representative in the Fredsberg taxation committee from 15-18, chairman of the Fredsberg life insurance committee, Töreboda power plant from 16-18, vice chairman of the Chalmers Engineering Association from 18-23, board member of the Swedish Publishing Association Employer Sector from 18-22, board member of the Stockholm Traffic Club since 30 (secretary 35-40), member of the Swedish Technology Association (road and water) since 40, expert member of the 1937 granite research committee, board member of the Cement and Concrete exhibition in 1941, chairman of the L S sports society in Gothenburg from 18-24, initiator and conductor of the Gothenburg Singers' Guild from 20-22, honorary conductor from 22, conductor of the Göta Par Bricoles choir from 20-25, 1st deputy conductor of the Västergötl singers' federation from 20-27, honorary member since 35, leader of singing trips to Denmark and Germany, music critic for Gbgs-Tidn from 21-22, Gbgs Aftbl from 23-24, superintendent of the Swedish Art exhibition in Gothenburg in 23, conductor of the Danish Foren Orchestra from 32-35, conductor of the Swedish Technology Association Orchestra since 39. Travels: USA 30, Germany, the Netherlands, Austria, Denmark, Norway, Finland several times. Publications: Cement and Concrete, Technical Popular Library, Cement Catechism, articles and lectures on concrete technology and traffic engineering economics. Compositions: Festive Overture for full orchestra, Skåningar, solo and male choir. Royal Order of Vasa, shooting medal, military defense service medal, Götiska förb, Gbg, Par Bricole. Hobbies: Singing, music, painting, tennis. Note: '\d\d m. partner's name' indicates that the person married in the year 19xx.

publication.name: Articles and Lectures on Concrete Technology and Traffic Engineering Economics

career.occupational_title: Superintendent of the Swedish Art Exhibition
